title: Mac won't download new client
body: So my mac isn't able to reach past around the 33-36% mark before telling me to retry the download. I have all the recommended specs and it is really confusing me on why it isn't working. Is there a file I must delete or something. This is the first time installing league on this and i have tried reinstalling multiple times.

replies.body: Are you on the legacy client currently?  At 33% or higher, your patcher needs to connect to the patching service to grab your updates.  Running into issues here can indicate a connection issue reaching those files.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up!
